thread.title: What becomes of the broken hearted? Helen Razer's 100 date odyssey
thread.title_full: What becomes of the broken hearted? Helen Razer's 100 date odyssey

title: What becomes of the broken hearted? Helen Razer's 100 date odyssey
text:
What becomes of the broken hearted? Helen Razer's 100 date odyssey Share MP3 available 22.17 MB 
When Helen's partner of 15 years left, Helen was miserable and out of control. 
Everywhere she looked she encountered what she calls the divorce myth â€” a narrative promoting divorce to women as a marvellous opportunity for personal growth. 
In stark contrast, Helen quit her job, stopped looking after herself, and stared into the existential abyss with only her cat for company. 
Eventually, her beautician issued a challenge: Helen should go on 100 dates, in one year. 
Accepting the challenge, she threw herself into the dating scene with her usual caustic bravado, but also, a genuine desire to meet 'the one'. 
Using hook-up apps, online matchmakers, speed dating, twitter, and old-fashioned personal recommendations, Helen met with multitudes of potentially compatible strangers. 
Content warning: contains topics and language of an adult nature, and is unsuitable for children.
